statements: DELETE FROM user_access WHERE user_id = 101 AND access_level > 5;
DELETE FROM user_access_levels WHERE user_id = 1234 AND access_level = 'admin';
DELETE FROM permissions WHERE permission_type = 'read' AND permission_status = TRUE AND user_id = 5678;
DELETE FROM access_logs WHERE user_id = 456 AND action_taken = 'Login success';
DELETE FROM breach_notifications WHERE breach_id = 101 AND user_id = 25;
DELETE FROM breach_notifications WHERE breach_id = 123 AND notification_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM data_breaches WHERE breach_date > '2021-06-30' AND description LIKE '%password%'
